description: It's decently simple to use and well set up, but lacks a save function. You can save, but you can't open that spesific file again. I think it's supposed to autosave to a list it shows you in the main window, but way too often when you open them again, changes are missing and some boxes of text will be empty. Do not rely on this.

I really like the simplicity of this lightweight app. It would be a really useful tool for organising ideas. Unfortunately, some changes are not saved on exit and when I open my maps the next time, some boxes are empty. I really hope someone could work on fixing that. It's a serious problem but probably not too difficult to fix. Until then, I'll have to use a more reliable mind-mapping program for Fedora 25.
summary: App has potential but has serious bugs

description:
This piece of software is really great. It has such a simple UserInterface. Nevertheless I have every tool I want to have to draw a MindMap.
The only thing I miss is an export to pdf. It also has no function to auto-balance or auto-rearrange the tree but I do not need it. Last to mention is the missing documentation. Yet it is very simple one or two functions are not intuitive (for me).
Simple pour une visualisation rapide de projets.
没有中文,没有教程,功能不清晰
